Many people expressing relief at the end of “American Idol” as if it were a show that hurt people, rather than just a show that was popular.

I'm forever indebted to American Idol for giving me so much content to farm when I was young and needed it most

I'm sad American Idol is ending only because I thought it might morph into The Hunger Games so slowly we wouldn't even notice.

I knew American Idol would never last without me #CANCELLED

Wait, so both CSI _and_ American Idol got cancelled today? <gets out guitar and harmonic> Come gather ‘round...
